listitem.para: This option configures when &Libreswan; will send &X.509; certificates to the remote host. Acceptable values are yes|always (signifying that we should always send a certificate), sendifasked (signifying that we should send a certificate if the remote end asks for it), and no|never (signifying that we will never send a X.509 certificate). The default for this option is always. Note that while always is suboptimal, setting this to sendifasked may break compatibility with other vendor's IPsec implementations, such as &Cisco; and SafeNet. If you find that you are getting errors about no ID/Key found, you likely need to revert this option to always.
This per-conn option replaced the global nocrsend option in &Libreswan; version 3.0.
